dcterms:creator: B. Krebs
dcterms:description: A publicly leaked set of 1036 email addresses of Nigerian cybercriminals who are known for committing specific scams namely: advance-fee, online dating and Nigerian letter scams.
dcterms:title: Publicly leaked set of 1036 email addresses of Nigerian cybercriminals

dcterms:creator: B. Krebs
dcterms:description: Primary Dataset 1 (PD1) contains English only records selected from the Facebook accounts of Nigerian cybercriminals.
dcterms:title: Primary Dataset 1 (PD1) - English only records

dcterms:creator: B. Krebs
dcterms:description: Primary Dataset 2 (PD2) contains half English and half Nigerian Pidgin records selected from the Facebook accounts of Nigerian cybercriminals.
dcterms:title: Primary Dataset 2 (PD2) - Half English and half Nigerian Pidgin records

dcterms:creator: B. Krebs
dcterms:description: Sub-dataset A (SD A) contains English unigram words extracted from Primary Dataset 1.
dcterms:title: Sub-dataset A (SD A) - English unigram words

dcterms:creator: B. Krebs
dcterms:description: Sub-dataset B (SD B) contains English bigram words extracted from Primary Dataset 1.
dcterms:title: Sub-dataset B (SD B) - English bigram words

dcterms:creator: B. Krebs
dcterms:description: Sub-dataset C (SD C) contains both English and Nigerian Pidgin unigram words extracted from Primary Dataset 2.
dcterms:title: Sub-dataset C (SD C) - English and Nigerian Pidgin unigram words

dcterms:creator: B. Krebs
dcterms:description: Sub-dataset D (SD D) contains both English and Nigerian Pidgin bigram words extracted from Primary Dataset 2.
dcterms:title: Sub-dataset D (SD D) - English and Nigerian Pidgin bigram words
